import useBasicInput from '../hooks/use-basicInput' const BasicForm = (props) => { const { value: enteredFirstName, isValid: enteredFirstNameIsValid, hasError: firstNameInputHasError, valueChangeHandler: firstNameChangeHandler, inputBlurHandler: firstNameBlurHandler, reset: resetFirstNameInput, } = useBasicInput((value) => value.trim() !== '') let formIsValid = false if (enteredFirstNameIsValid) { formIsValid = true } const formSubmissionHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() if (enteredFirstNameIsValid) { return } console.log('Entered FirstName: ', enteredFirstName) resetFirstNameInput() } const firstNameInputClasses = firstNameInputHasError ? 'form-control invalid' : 'form-control' return (
) } export default BasicForm
